longBusinessSummary: Makino Milling Machine Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of machine tools in Japan, China, rest of Asia, the United States, rest of Americas, Europe, and internationally. The company offers machining centers, numerical control electrical discharge machines, and milling machines; CAD/CAM systems, FMS, other products, and engineering services. It also provides 5-axis control horizontal and vertical machining, graphite processing, small hole electric discharge, NC electric discharge, wire electric discharge, laser processing machine, milling machine, CAD/CAM software, and smart tool related products. In addition, the company offers manufacturing support mobile robot, pallet exchange, sub-pallet change/transport, pallet transport, loader transfer, robot transport system, and tool measuring related machines. Further, it provides operating and application software, machine control, and network monitoring system, as well as offers after sale services. The company serves car, semiconductor, mold, aerospace, job shop, medical care, and microfabrication sectors. The company was formerly known as Makino Vertical Milling Machine Works and changed its name to Makino Milling Machine Co., Ltd. in April 1961. Makino Milling Machine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
